sentences: Andrew Sebastian Williams (born 18 February 1970) is the drummer and vocalist of Doves.
Andy and Jez were born in Manchester, England and have a brother Dominic and sister Sarah.
While Doves were on a hiatus between 2010 and 2020, Andy and Jez Williams formed a side project called Black Rivers, releasing a self-titled album in February 2015.
He also plays the melodica during live acoustic versions of "Snowden" (see: "Snowden" live at Waterloo Records, Texas).
